category.name: Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_QRY_display_latest_dataset_only
preference.preference_description: Enables the display of only the latest version of dataset objects in results of queries with search class as the super class of dataset or its descendant classes (for example, queries with search class as WorkspaceObject). Valid Values: 0 - Displays all versions of the dataset. 1 - Displays only the latest version of dataset objects.
